mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT activityType FROM t_activity WHERE organizationId = #{organizationId} ORDER BY activityType ASC
SELECT DISTINCT activityDate FROM t_activity where organizationId = #{organizationId} ORDER BY activityDate DESC
SELECT tm.memberNick,tsfs.* FROM t_span_fort_score tsfs,t_member tm WHERE tsfs.memberId = tm.memberId AND tsfs.activityId = #{activityId} order by tsfs.score desc,tsfs.memberId asc
mapper.update: update t_span_fort_score set score=#{score} where joinId = #{joinId}
mapper.select: SELECT tmf.*,tm.memberId,tm.memberNick FROM t_member_fight tmf,t_member tm WHERE tmf.memberId = tm.memberId AND tm.memberType = 1 AND tm.memberStatus = 1 AND tmf.activityId = #{activityId} ORDER BY tmf.memberId ASC
SELECT * FROM t_member_fight WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND endDate = DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
